problem.markdown:
Question 1 of 4 1. The advantage of using oil in OCB as an arc quenching medium is:
() It has high dielectric strength (x) Both It has high dielectric strength and As a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property () As a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property () Highly inflammable
2. SF6 circuit breaker is __________
() Expensive () SF6 gas has to be reconditioned after every operation of the breaker and additional equipment is required for these purposes (x) Both Expensive and SF6 gas has to be reconditioned after every operation of the breaker and additional equipment is required for these purposes () None
3. The important characteristics of the fluid used in CB are _______
() It should have good thermal and chemical stability () Non- inflammability and high thermal conductivity () It should have high dielectric strength and are extinguish ability (x) All
4. A circuit breaker is an automatically operated electrical switch designed to protect an electrical circuit from damage caused by ________ function of __________ is to isolate the part of the power system in case of abnormal conditions.
() None () Short circuit (x) Both overhead and short circuit () Overhead
problem.p: 1. The advantage of using oil in OCB as an arc quenching medium is:

choicegroup.choice: Both It has high dielectric strength and As a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property
As a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property
SF6 gas has to be reconditioned after every operation of the breaker and additional equipment is required for these purposes
Both Expensive and SF6 gas has to be reconditioned after every operation of the breaker and additional equipment is required for these purposes

problem.p: 3. The important characteristics of the fluid used in CB are _______

choicegroup.choice: It should have good thermal and chemical stability
Non- inflammability and high thermal conductivity
It should have high dielectric strength and are extinguish ability

problem.p: 4. A circuit breaker is an automatically operated electrical switch designed to protect an electrical circuit from damage caused by ________ function of __________ is to isolate the part of the power system in case of abnormal conditions.
